verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:13
verses.text: So the Philistines were subdued, and they came no more into the coast of Israel: and the hand of the Lord was against the Philistines all the days of Samuel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:14
verses.text: And the cities which the Philistines had taken from Israel were restored to Israel, from Ekron even unto Gath; and the coasts thereof did Israel deliver out of the hands of the Philistines. And there was peace between Israel and the Amorites.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:15
verses.text: And Samuel judged Israel all the days of his life.
